question:
Assume the tag handler for a st:simple tag extends SimpleTagSupport. In what way can scriptlet
code be used in the body of st:simple?

options.A: set the body content type to JSP in the TLD
options.B: Scriptlet code is NOT legal in the body of st:simple.
options.C: add scripting-enabled=”true” to the start tag for the st:simple element
options.D: add a pass-through Classic tag with a body content type of JSP to the body of st:simple, and place the scriptlet code in the body of that tag
